text: We liked it but the selection was small. Defiantly a one of a kind place. The staff is super nice.

name: Ginger Stone
text: I dropped my vape and messed my batteries up in my vape they were awesome and just one block down from mugshots. I literally just walked there in about 8 mins😁🤩🙂🙂😎💜

name: RonKeith Wells
text: I would definitely recommend this place staff are really helpful and the prices are great will visit again

name: KAYLA NICOLE HAYNES
text: Very good with getting u the best deal I could think of and very nice

text: Very good customer service and fun enviorment gun friendly establishment would gladly recommend

name: Thomas James
text: Very professional staff and cool vibe!!!!

name: JaMarcus JOE
text: Great place to sit, hookah, dance and chill. They also sell alcohol.

name: jessica green
text: Awesome eclectic place. Very retro and relaxing environment. Great place for friends. Delicious blends and really helpful staff. Prices great too!! Small establishment so arrive early for best seat in the house☺

name: George Odom
text: Will be going again! Enjoyed watching DFOD dance and show some killer dance moves! Nervii's painting was awesome too! Very friendly employees too! Just a great vibe and atmosphere!

name: lasioncox
text: Last night the place was very busy. My boyfriend and I had to sit in the rocking chairs off to the side. I didn't mind our seating arrangement cause the chairs were very comfortable. However,after going to the restroom and returning, my chair leaned backwards into the hookah causing the coal to fall into my lap and my boot. Luckily, I was able to remove the coal quickly enough from my lap, but it had embedded deeply enough into my boot that I could not get to it quickly enough. The flames have caused second degree burns on my foot and my ankle. I am not bashing the company. I always have a grand time when I go,but I do feel that as a place with open fires and hazardous equipment the owner/manager should have a first aid kit for accidents such as mine. When i asked the server for some ointment she said they didn't have any. They were kind enough to give me a bag of ice at least. However, I just feel that the situation could've been handled better. After the incident happened and the ice was given my server continued her duties and I had to end my night early to get the proper medical supplies for the burns on my foot. IF YOU INTEND ON GOING HERE BE WARNED NOT TO SIT IN THE ROCKING CHAIRS WHILE SMOKING A HOOKAH OR TELL YOUR SERVER TO SET THE HOOKAH FURTHER AWAY FROM THE CHAIRS. my overall experience and respect for this place has plummeted. Accidents do happen, but with the proper customer service somethings could be looked over. That was not the case in this situation.

name: Tanisha Price
text: Awesome place! Great Atmosphere! (Laid Back) I honestly have to say whenever I come I feel welcome even if you dont have a seat lol they ask if they can help you! Customer Service is Awesome they're continuously checking on you.... Pricing is Great.

name: Hiram Claytor
text: This is a place Montgomery needs. Diverse crowd. Being from ATL, best time I've had in the gump

name: Scott Burbank
text: Great staff,  good selection of drinks and hookahs and I really enjoy the night's they bring in the DJs

name: Imagine Creation

text:
(Translated by Google) Only shisha bar in this place and unfortunately it's bad.

Friendly staff and service is ok.
But the pipes are not good and they quickly taste like coal.
Pipes and plates are dirty.
From the outside, the shop doesn't seem inviting and from the inside the bar is only partially cozy.
Prices at $ 15 would be fine if the pipe tasted good.

Free wifi
Parking spaces in front of the lounge

(Original)
Einzige Shishabar in diesem Ort und leider ist sie schlecht.

Freundliches Personal und Service ist ok.
Aber die Pfeifen sind nicht gut und sie schmecken schnell nach Kohle.
Pfeifen und Teller sind verdreckt.
Von außen wirkt der Laden nicht einladend und von innen ist die Bar nur bedingt gemütlich.
Preise für 15$ wären in Ordnung, wenn die Pfeife schmecken würde.

Kostenloses WiFi
Parkplätze direkt vor der Lounge

name: Sam Lloyd
text:
The owner knows his wines! I needed a bottle of red wine to go with our dinner of fresh pompano (a white fish).

He selected the perfect bottle for our evening. Great store!

name: Bethany Herrod
text: I’ve always received great service here and excellent wine! They rotate through what’s on the menu, and you can always select a bottle from the store to open at the bar. Cant wait for some outdoor seating, but the inside is cozy and there’s plenty of room!!

name: g m
text: Thanks for the Le Morette recommendation. We came into town for a wedding and bought one bottle as a gift for the bride and groom and one bottle for us to take back home with us. I don't know how the wedding party liked it, but we thoroughly enjoyed it with our low country boil this weekend. Thanks so much for a fantastic recommendation and fantastic service.

resp.text: You're so welcome! Glad you liked it. Come back and see us when you are back in town.

name: Brigham Godfrey
text: We had the BEST time at our evening with the sommelier, Rachel. Every time I go to the Classic Wine Shop, I learn something new. It’s always a very inviting and enriching experience. They are knowledgeable and friendly, and I always discover a new fun pairing!

name: Elizabeth Roberts
text: What a treat!  It's a beautiful store with an extensive selection of wines.  Josh Terrell, the owner, has a very deep and broad knowledge of wines.  There is a wine bar in the rear of the store with a good selection of wines for any palate, in a very pleasant setting.   This will definitely become a regular stop for me... for wine tastings, a glass of wine or a bottle for myself or friends.  Thanks Josh!

resp.text: Thank y’all for stopping by yesterday. It was good to see you.

name: Lakessa Payne
text: Very knowledgeable super friendly

name: scott giles
text: Very friendly, and knowledgeable staff. The selection is vast and excellent.

text: Excellent wine store. The owner is incredibly knowledgeable and helpful, no matter your budget. Come for the great wines, stay for the atmosphere. Wine tastings on Fridays at 5

name: John Cantrell

They recommended me to the best bottle he had that was comparable.

name: John loper
text: A nice variety of wines available by the bottle. A rotating wine "tap" and a few craft beers in the cooler. Plus some local artists works for sale.

name: Rache Taylor
text: Uncorked is a cute little wine spot. I came here with my mom for her to purchase wine bottles for her guest for her annual company holiday party. We walked around and looked at all the wine they had to offer before having a little tasting. We tried different wines before picking the wines she wanted to purchase. It was fun. It seemed like a place for a cute date night with the girls or significant other. They do offer cheese boards and wine as well as parties. We didn't have time for the cheese board, but they do have a nice selection of wine to choose from. Definitely give them a try. I plan to go back with my husband when in town and we have free time.

name: Chandra Williams
text: A cute wine spot with good vibes and great wine selection. The owner, Saranne, was very accommodating. A must try.

resp.text: Thank you so much Chandra! We loved having you!

name: Preston Taylor
text:
What a great atmosphere, and fantastic service. I had the pleasure of meeting the owner who was very friendly and knowledgeable.

The champagne cheddar cheese on our charcuterie board was delicious! Melting in your mouth goodness. I can’t wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you Preston!  It was such a joy to have you and Will visit us!

name: Jenna Kane
text: We stopped in yesterday evening, tried a few glasses of wine and a small cheese board. We had a great experience and would definitely recommend anyone to stop in for a tasting or a unique bottle!

resp.text: Thank you Jenna! It was a pleasure having you!

name: Sheridan Hinton
text: A must go! Amazing food, exceptional wine selection curated by the owner, and a great atmosphere.

name: Eryn Patton
text: Great selection! Saranne has taken extra precautions to keep the shop sanitized, which makes me feel at ease. I called ahead and requested a case of wine, giving her parameters for type of wine I typically enjoy and ideal pricepoint. She had it ready to go in an hour! Can't say enough great things.

name: Jesse Latimer
text: Excellent experience with Saranne and everyone else at the shop when I coordinated with them for a group wine tasting! It was a smooth process setting up the wine tasting, and everyone--especially Saranne--made it a pleasant experience for us all! I highly recommend them and look forward to visiting their lovely shop again!

name: Victoria Hervias
text: These people are WONDERFUL! Not only are they knowledgeable but they watched my dog for me. I was in a bind and had to grab some wine but I had my pup with me. They watched her so I could run in. 10/10 would recommend! Thanks Rick and Molly!!!!

name: Dana Aycock
text:
I loved coming here! I had a bottle of Cabernet Sauvignon, You can get a bottle of wine to consume onsite for a $10 corkage fee, which I think is reasonable. I also ordered one of the small charcuterie plates. The Arabelle pepper jelly was so good I ended up buying a jar to take home!

It is a great place to sit and have a glass (or 7) of wine with a friend. It's a very relaxing atmosphere. There was soft music playing in the background. The wine was delicious and fairly priced. The staff was very friendly. I will definitely be back here the next time I am in town.

name: Lauren Simpson
text: Love this place so much. I have a budget when it comes to wine, and they always help me find a cheap bottle that I’ll love, without making me feel bad about asking for the cheap stuff. The staff is so sweet and I always feel welcome and invited when I visit!!

name: Treasure Williams
text:
Refined and Elegant

High quality, classy place to gather for wine on a date. Mrs. Saranne is very, very knowledgeable on choosing the best wine for an occasion. I am noe a long term customer.

name: Keith Jackson
text: Neat wine shop. They have bottles, by the glass, and light snacks. This place is right in the middle of Providence, and is in a great location for walking to different restaurants or bars.  There's always plenty of parking in the surrounding lots or street.  Will go again.

name: Leanne Hoskins
text: Such a great little wine shop in the Providence area!  Wonderful service!  However, they are only open until 7pm, including Friday and Saturday nights.  I hope this changes to a little later in the evening. *fingers crossed*

name: John Fox
text: Taking a wine tasting class next week!

name: Mikus Lymon
text: It’s not the best place to get wine. Nobody helped me while trying to select wine. I kinda felt unwanted. Just being honest.

name: Richard Riccio
text:
I have purchased wine in this shop as customer on 18 different visits and I’m there twice a week because I handle the payroll and accounting for the owner.

I have never experienced or witnessed any level of service other than 5 star and above so I took it upon myself to reach out to Mikus Lymon, who left a bad review, and make amends on behalf of the business.

In spite of extensive searches on Facebook, People Search and other similar sites, no evidence of the existence of a “Mikus Lymon” was found pre-supposing the likelihood of a retaliatory and/or fraudulent review.

resp.text: I am so sorry that you believe we are pricey.  We have an entire section of wines all well under $20, in fact we have wines starting at $6.99 per bottle.  If there was something in particular you felt we were over priced on we would love to know.
